msbt.message: Sounds like things are revving up out there. You doing the egg-collecting thing too, ?Those candy eggs are so delicious. If I didn't need to keep a few around for DIY
You meet that dude in the plaza yet? The dancing one who's definitely not in a costume? Ha! Yeah, right I can't imagine what it's gotta smell like in there,

Too much eggs-citement? 'Cause that's eggs-actly why I'm here. Didn't wanna over-eggs-ert myself.I'm more than happy to play the eggs-ile. Like, it'd take a deus eggs machina to get me back out there.Well, you don't need an egg-scuse with me. My house is your house, so pull up a chair andeggs-hale.

OK, I guess rocks are laying eggs now? I keep finding stone eggs near the rocks around here.Plus I heard someone hit a rock on a Nook Miles Ticket tour island and a whole pile of 'em popped out.Look, I'm no expert, but I think I know enough about geology to say that's not normal, .

The other day I had this crazy dream where I was fighting a coconut tree wearing pastel tights, .It came at me with a high grab so I went in low, hit it with an uppercut and a load of candy eggs spilled out!OK, hitting eggs out of a coconut tree doesn't make sense, but it did in the dream, and it was AWESOME!
You hyped up for Bunny Day? is gonna be here in no time, !
